data.name: XmlHelperFacts_SoapFault
data.value: <Fault xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <faultcode xmlns="">Client.705</faultcode> <faultstring xmlns="">Input validation error</faultstring> <faultactor xmlns="">76S</faultactor> <detail xmlns=""> <ns1:errorDetailItem xmlns:ns1="http://integration.sprint.com/common/ErrorDetailsV2.xsd"> <ns1:providerError> <ns1:providerErrorCode>Client.705</ns1:providerErrorCode> <ns1:providerErrorText>http://208.10.68.88:10004/services/QueryPlansAndOptionsService: cvc-particle 3.1: in element banInfo of type BanInfoType, found </banInfo>, but next item should be any of [ban, accountType, customerTypeDescription]</ns1:providerErrorText> </ns1:providerError> </ns1:errorDetailItem> </detail> </Fault>
